--- layout: example.html title: topolis integration shortdesc: Example on how to use topolis with OpenLayers. docs: > Example showing the integration of topolis with OpenLayers, enabling creating and editing topological geometry. Standard interaction draws edges, snapping to existing edges. Delete an edge by drawing a new edge crossing the one to delete. tags: "draw, edit, vector, topology, topolis" resources: - https://cdn.rawgit.com/bjornharrtell/topolis/releases/0.1.1/topolis.min.js - https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.1.1.min.js - https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/toastr.js/2.1.3/toastr.min.js - https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/toastr.js/2.1.3/toastr.min.css ---
